page.title: 07Law and Order
page.content: Norden is a quiet, semi-rural area near to open moorland and hill farms. The local police patrol up to the boundary near to Red Lumb at the foot of Knowl Moor. The area is popular for its walks among the hills but this can lead to friction with farmers concerned over the problem of walkers' dogs worrying their sheep. Occasionally dogs have been shot although prosecutions for trespass or sheep worrying are rare. Norden village has its own community policeman, Eddie Reeder, who patrols only in the village itself and has regular contact with local schools. He lives in Norden and gets around on a bike which, he says, can take him places a car could not.
